Text: @BBCNews Small steps? Schools open, car showrooms open, parties in gardens, shielded people allowed out all at the same time.  Is that so we don't talk about #dominiccummings or so a rising R rate can be blamed on us peasants rather than opening schools? #dailybriefings #covid19

Nasty Nancy again attacked President Trump! She said he refusing to condemn rioters and looters! Is this woman in our reality?? She said President Trump is fanning the flames! This witch is delusional! I didn't hear her condemn the Terrorists. Did anyone???

"He didn't give me an opportunity to even speak." George Floyd's brother, Philonise Floyd, described how his conversation with Donald Trump went."It was hard...he just kept, like, pushing me off, like 'I don't want to hear what you're talking about.'" https://t.co/vbqNJAi52l

Just in: @Sakeliga won court case, with costs. Now no extra permits necessary to trade during Covid19, except self-issued permit. State was implementing business licensing system under guise of medical crisis. On Sunday, Patel;CIPC withdrew certificate portal. More info tomorrow.

I never thought that Cyril was just like the others in the ANC. I thought that he had some rational thinking skills. But no. He's mired in moronic politics. We need to grow the economy. Not reset it. And he's a R6.4 billion hypocrite. BEE huh!
